data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Gabès.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gabès, Tunisia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Gabès that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 111 believers in Gabès that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Gabès, Tunisia by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Gabès, Tunisia that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Gabès, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Gabès to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

location.name: Gabès
location.cities_list: Gabès, El Hamma, Bou Attouche, Matmata
location.cities_list_w_pop: Gabès (110,075), El Hamma (73,512), Bou Attouche (2,700), Matmata (2,406)
